transArray.content: Clean and hygienic, good service, and free parking spaces, which is good

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. We strive to make every guest happy to become a repeat customer. The hotel is located at Gate 2 East of Badili Automobile Park. Take Metro Line 6 and exit from Haidian Wuluju Station. You can walk directly to the hotel in 3-5 minutes. The parking space shared with the park can maximize your travel needs. If you donâ€™t have a parking space, you only need to enter your license plate number at the front desk before going out to enjoy a comprehensive discount on parking fees. All hotel staff look forward to seeing you again and wish you a happy life! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
